item.title: [ERROR] Reached end of file while parsing
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

Not
[code]import source.server.util.Misc;[/code]

Also you need to add a Random() method to your Misc class.
[code]	public static int random(int range) {
		return (int) (java.lang.Math.random() * (range + 1));
	}[/code]

Not

Also you need to add a Random() method to your Misc class.

public static int random(int range) { return (int) (java.lang.Math.random() * (range + 1)); }

Read full topic

item.source: [ERROR] Reached end of file while parsing

item.title: [ERROR] Reached end of file while parsing
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;
import server.model.players.PlayerHandler;
import server.util.Misc;

public class ItemOnPlayer implements PacketType {

@override

public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
	int fromInterface = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
	int otherPlayerId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
	int useItemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
	int useItemSlot = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndian();
	if(c.playerRights > 2) {
		System.out.println("Player: "+c.playerId+" used  item: "+useItemId+" Slot: "+useItemSlot+" Interface: "+fromInterface);
	}
	if((c.playerItems[useItemSlot]-1) != useItemId) {
		return;
	}
	switch(useItemId) {
		case 962:
			c.gfx0(176);
			c.startAnimation(451);
			c.sendMessage("You pull the Christmas Cracker...");
			c.sendMessage("You pull the Christmas Cracker...");
			c.getItems().deleteItem(useItemId, 1);
			if(Misc.random(1) == 1) {
				c.forcedText = "Yay I got the Cracker!";
				c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
				c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random(5)*2), 1);
			} else {
				c.forcedText = "Yay I got the Cracker!";
				c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;       
				c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random(5)*2), 1);                       
			}
			c.turnPlayerTo(c.absX, c.absY);
		break;
	}
}

}[/code]
Try that for your ‘ItemOnPlayer’ class.

Read full topic

item.title: [ERROR] Reached end of file while parsing
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

Top bit of my Misc.Java

[code]package server.util;

import java.text.NumberFormat;
import source.server.util.Misc;

public class Misc {

public static String formatPlayerName(String s) {
	for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
		if (i == 0) {
			s = String.format( "%s%s",
			Character.toUpperCase(s.charAt(0)), s.substring(1) );
		}
		if (!Character.isLetterOrDigit(s.charAt(i))) {
			if (i + 1 < s.length()) {
				s = String.format("%s%s%s", s.subSequence(0, i+1), Character.toUpperCase(s.charAt(i + 1)), s.substring(i+2) );
			}
		}
	}
	return s.replace("_", " ");
}

public static String longToPlayerName(long l) {
	int i = 0;
	char ac[] = new char[12];
	while(l != 0L) {
		long l1 = l;
		l /= 37L;
		ac[11 - i++] = playerNameXlateTable[(int)(l1 - l * 37L)];
	}
	return new String(ac, 12 - i, i);
}[/code]

From my compiler, there is source/server/util/misc.java

Still getting the damn errors

[code]source\server\util\Misc.java:4: error: package source.server.util does not exist

import source.server.util.Misc;
^
source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:10: error: cannot find sym
bol
@override
^
symbol: class override
location: class ItemOnPlayer
source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:30: error: cannot find sym
bol
if(Misc.random(1) == 1) {
^
symbol: variable Misc
location: class ItemOnPlayer
source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:33: error: cannot find sym
bol
c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random
(5)*2), 1);
^
symbol: variable Misc
location: class ItemOnPlayer
source\server\model\players\packets\ItemOnPlayer.java:37: error: cannot find sym
bol
c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random
(5)*2), 1);
^
symbol: variable Misc
location: class ItemOnPlayer
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.source: [ERROR] Reached end of file while parsing

item.title: [ERROR] Reached end of file while parsing
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

See the imports up the top?

This is basically saying that it wants to ‘import’ or include this files information. You just need to locate your Misc.java and put it under the other methods up the top.

server.folder.filename; is the directory, so just find where Misc.java is. If it’s in folder called ‘util’ then the above code would work, otherwise replace the middle bit with the directory.

Read full topic

item.description:
@soapface wrote:

[quote=“Onix, post:6, topic:444563”][code]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;
import server.model.players.PlayerHandler;

public class ItemOnPlayer implements PacketType {

@override

    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
            int fromInterface = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
            int otherPlayerId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
            int useItemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
            int useItemSlot = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndian();
            if(c.playerRights > 2) {
                    System.out.println("Player: "+c.playerId+" used  item: "+useItemId+" Slot: "+useItemSlot+" Interface: "+fromInterface);
            }
            if((c.playerItems[useItemSlot]-1) != useItemId) {
                    return;
            }
            switch(useItemId) {

case 962:
c.gfx0(176);
c.startAnimation(451);
c.sendMessage(“You pull the Christmas Cracker…”);
c.sendMessage(“You pull the Christmas Cracker…”);
c.getItems().deleteItem(useItemId, 1);
if(Misc.random(1) == 1) {
c.forcedText = “Yay I got the Cracker!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random(5)*2), 1);
} else {
c.forcedText = “Yay I got the Cracker!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random(5)*2), 1);
}
c.turnPlayerTo(c.absX, c.absY);
break;

            }

    }

}
[/code]I fixed them errors for you, that should work. All you need to do is import Misc, because it can’t find the Misc method when you call Misc.random().[/quote]

How do I Import Misc?
I apologise for my such newbie knowledge.
I’m still learning.

item.title: [ERROR] Reached end of file while parsing
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;
import server.model.players.PlayerHandler;

public class ItemOnPlayer implements PacketType {

@override

    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
            int fromInterface = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
            int otherPlayerId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
            int useItemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
            int useItemSlot = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndian();
            if(c.playerRights > 2) {
                    System.out.println("Player: "+c.playerId+" used  item: "+useItemId+" Slot: "+useItemSlot+" Interface: "+fromInterface);
            }
            if((c.playerItems[useItemSlot]-1) != useItemId) {
                    return;
            }
            switch(useItemId) {

case 962:
c.gfx0(176);
c.startAnimation(451);
c.sendMessage(“You pull the Christmas Cracker…”);
c.sendMessage(“You pull the Christmas Cracker…”);
c.getItems().deleteItem(useItemId, 1);
if(Misc.random(1) == 1) {
c.forcedText = “Yay I got the Cracker!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random(5)*2), 1);
} else {
c.forcedText = “Yay I got the Cracker!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random(5)*2), 1);
}
c.turnPlayerTo(c.absX, c.absY);
break;

            }

    }

}
[/code]I fixed them errors for you, that should work. All you need to do is import Misc, because it can’t find the Misc method when you call Misc.random().

Read full topic

            int otherPlayerId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
            int useItemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
            int useItemSlot = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndian();

case 962:
c.gfx0(176);

o.sendMessage(“You pull the Christmas Cracker…”);

item.title: [ERROR] Reached end of file while parsing
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

This error is occurring with my ItemOnPlayer.java

My ItemOnPlayer.java

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;
import server.model.players.PlayerHandler;

public class ItemOnPlayer implements PacketType {

@override

public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
	int fromInterface = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
	int otherPlayerId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
	int useItemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
	int useItemSlot = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndian();
	if(c.playerRights > 2) {
		System.out.println("Player: "+c.playerId+" used  item: "+useItemId+" Slot: "+useItemSlot+" Interface: "+fromInterface);
	}
	if((c.playerItems[useItemSlot]-1) != useItemId) {
		return;
	}
	switch(useItemId) {

case 962:
c.gfx0(176);
c.startAnimation(451);
c.sendMessage(“You pull the Christmas Cracker…”);
o.sendMessage(“You pull the Christmas Cracker…”);
c.getItems().deleteItem(useItemId, 1);
if(Misc.random(1) == 1) {
o.forcedText = “Yay I got the Cracker!”;
o.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
o.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random(5)*2), 1);
} else {
c.forcedText = “Yay I got the Cracker!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.getItems().addItem((1038 + Misc.random(5)*2), 1);
}
c.turnPlayerTo(o.absX, o.absY);
break;

	}

}
[/code]

Compile error

source\server\model\players\ItemOnPlayer.java:44: error: reached end of file whi le parsing } ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I know it means the amount of closing and opening braces don’t match, but I don’t know how to fix it.
